trans-unit.source: Controls access to shared property groups.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SharedPropertyGroupManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SharedPropertyGroupManager"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Finds or creates a property group with the given information.
trans-unit.target: Finner eller oppretter en egenskapsgruppe med den angitte informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Using `dwIsoMode`, during get and set operations, you can either choose to make locking properties atomic by specifying <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode>, or to lock properties over the duration of the method call by specifying <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode>.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av `dwIsoMode`, under get og sett operasjoner, kan du enten velge å gjøre låsetillatelse egenskaper atomic ved å angi <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode>, eller for å låse egenskaper over varigheten for metoden Ring ved å angi <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not use <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode> when creating a property group in a constructor, doing so can result in a deadlock.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Bruker ikke <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode>Når du oppretter en egenskapsgruppe i en konstruktør, gjøre derfor kan det føre til en vranglås.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode>

trans-unit.source: If the release mode specified for `dwRelMode` is <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyReleaseMode>, the property specified by `name` is held alive for the lifetime of the process.
trans-unit.target: Hvis versjonen-modus er angitt for `dwRelMode` er <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyReleaseMode>, angitt av egenskapen `name` holdes aktiv for levetiden for prosessen.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyReleaseMode>

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
See the Remarks section for more information.

When this method returns, contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property already existed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the call created the property.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, inneholder <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> dersom egenskapen eksisterer; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis kallet opprettet egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the enumeration interface for the collection.
The enumerator interface for the collection.
Finds the property group with the given name.
